name: Philip Saunders
bio: Founder of Nebulis. Ethereum developer and former Exosphere Fellow. Born and raised in Ireland.

name: Mohamed Alborno
bio: Filmmaker and entrepreneur from Egypt, living in Canada. Founder of A New Country.

name: Harsh Vakharia
bio: Engineer by passion. Creator by heart. Admires simplicity.

name: Jérôme de Tychey
bio: French-Luxembourger economist and miner. Passionate about building teams.

name: Scott McKibbin
bio: Graduate in Computer Science from the University of Pittsbugh with a speciality in information security.

name: Max Benson
bio: Soon-to-be graduate of Computer Science, University of Pittsburgh. Intern at Human Computer Interaction Institute at CMU.

name: Matt McKibbin
bio: Technologically savvy, extroverted connector with a drive for decentralization. Founder at Ubitquity, d10e.
